name: WalletBalanceProvider
description: WalletBalanceProvider contract. NOTE: THIS CONTRACT IS NOT USED WITHIN THE AAVE PROTOCOL. It's an accessory contract used to reduce the number of calls towards the blockchain from the Aave backend.*. Implements a logic of getting multiple tokens balance for one user address.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Check the token balance of a wallet in a token contract Returns the balance of the token for user. Avoids possible errors: - return 0 on non-contract address*.

functionDecorators.name: batchBalanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Fetches, for a list of _users and _tokens (ETH included with mock address), the balances.

returnDecorators.description: And array with the concatenation of, for each user, his/her balances*.

functionDecorators.name: getUserWalletBalances
functionDecorators.description: provides balances of user wallet for all reserves available on the pool.
